TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MASState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The enumerated MASState that can indicate what state of SDK currently is at.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASState DidLoad = int32(1)

Docs.summary: State that SDK did load; at this state, all services have been loaded. This state will only be invoked once for the appâ€™s lifecycle.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASState DidStart = int32(3)

Docs.summary: State that SDK did start; at this state, SDK should be fully functional.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASState DidStop = int32(5)

Docs.summary: State that SDK will stop; at this state, SDK is preparing to stop the lifecycle and shutting down all elements and services for the SDK.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASState IsBeingStopped = int32(6)

Docs.summary: State that SDK is being forced to stop.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASState NotConfigured = int32(-1)

Docs.summary: State that SDK has not been initialized and does not have configuration file either in local file system based on the default configuration file name, nor in the keychain storage.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASState NotInitialized = int32(0)

Docs.summary: State that SDK has the active configuration either in the local file system, or keychain storage, but has not been inistialized yet.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASState WillStart = int32(2)

Docs.summary: State that SDK will start; at this state, SDK is initializing and prepareing all elements required to operate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASState WillStop = int32(4)

Docs.summary: State that SDK will stop; at this state, SDK is preparing to stop the lifecycle and shutting down all elements and services for the SDK.
